r x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lflf.d | |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lflf.k | |- K = ( Base ` D ) |
| 3 |  | lflf.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lflf.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` W ) = ( +g ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` W ) = ( .s ` W ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` D ) = ( +g ` D ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` D ) = ( .r ` D ) |
| 9 | 3, 5, 1, 6, 2, 7, 8, 4 | #P_islfl | |- ( W e. X -> ( G e. F <-> ( G : V --> K /\ A. r e. K A. x e. V A. y e. V ( G ` ( ( r ( .s ` W ) x ) ( +g ` W ) y ) ) = ( ( r ( .r ` D ) ( G ` x ) ) ( +g ` D ) ( G ` y ) ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simprbda | |- ( ( W e. X /\ G e. F ) -> G : V --> K ) |
